How would you tell someone about Creative Commons?
Here are some toolkits to help start the conversation.

Basics of CC

What is Creative Commons and what are the CC licenses? Get basic info to share the importance of CC with others.

View toolkit »

Education

Why does CC matter in education? See how CC helps expand access and improve the quality of education around the world.

View toolkit »

Government

Why does CC matter in government? See how CC helps improve transparency, efficiency, and innovation.

View toolkit »


Creative Industries

Why does CC matter in creative industries? See how CC enhances creative collaboration.

View toolkit »

Science

Why does CC matter in science? See how CC licenses go beyond access and help us advance our understanding of the world.

View toolkit »

Culture

Why does CC matter in the GLAM sector? See how CC helps us preserve, build upon, and share the world’s cultural heritage.

View toolkits »




CC Resource Archive Submit a resource

Want to see more resources that help explain CC? Come view the archive and add resources you've created or seen in the wild.





Collaborate
Tools for remixing

Interested in tools that can help you communicate your message? Here is a collection of free and open source software tools for working with CC-licensed content.




Map


The CC Toolkits project was bootstrapped through events run by affiliates in CC's global network.





Did your affiliate team make or share resources about CC?
Help us show where we are having an impact by adding your event to the map.
